summary: Vague report of something not working, needs clarification
suggested_reply: I'm sorry to hear something isn't working right. To help you faster, could you please provide a bit more detail? Specifically: 1) Which feature or part of the app is affected?, 2) What were you trying to do when the problem occurred?, 3) Do you see any error messages?, 4) What device/browser are you using? With this information, I can get you to the right solution quickly!
